        java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> table

      • star

        boolean star
        boolean variable for understanding if the block is a starred block

      • primo_fac

        int primo_fac
        important variable for the square brackets block. In particular, it allows to maintain the right start node for the substitution recursive process

        sigma: - alphabet

    • Method Detail

      • Scanner

        public int Scanner(java.lang.String re,
                   char[] sigma)
        Checks the regex lexicon to avoid not allowed regex.
        Specified by:
        Scanner in interface RegexParser_interface
        Parameters:
        re: - Regex
        sigma: - alphabet
        Returns:
        returns an integer. If the value is 0, no errors; else, there is an error. The different error codes refer to different error popups.

      • Parser

        public int Parser(java.lang.String re,
                  char[] sigma)
        Checks the regex sintax to avoid not allowed regex.
        Specified by:
        Parser in interface RegexParser_interface
        Parameters:
        re: - Regex
        sigma: - alphabet
        Returns:
        returns an integer. If the value is 0, no errors; else, there is an error. The different error codes refer to different error popups.

      • Resolve

        public void Resolve(java.lang.String regex,
                    char[] sigma)
        Runs the regex division process and the recursive substitution process
        Specified by:
        Resolve in interface RegexParser_interface
        Parameters:
        regex: - Regex
        sigma: - alphabet

      • create_hashTable

        private int create_hashTable(java.lang.String regex,
                             java.lang.String sigma,
                             java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> table,
                             java.lang.Integer key,
                             java.lang.Integer num_stato,
                             java.lang.Integer start,
                             java.lang.Integer end,
                             boolean block,
                             boolean sub)
        core method of the application. It creates the block structure and the block implementation which after replace the block into the graph.
        Parameters:
        regex: - string to process
        sigma: - alphabet
        table: - HashTable which contains the graph structure
        key: - key of the HashTable
        num_stato: - nodes counter
        start: - start node for the substitution process
        end: - end node for the substitution process
        block: - true if regex is a block
        sub: - true if the substitution process is started
        Returns:
        returns last node number used into the recursive process.

        Translates the graph table in the graph object.
        Parameters:
        table: - table to translate

      • returnBlock

        public static java.lang.String returnBlock(java.lang.String s,
                                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> openList)
        creates internal block structure: round and square block structure and manages internal U.
        Parameters:
        s: - string to process
        openList: - ArrayList contains the internal block implementation
        Returns:
        returns a string contains the block symbolic structure.

        Returns:
        returns a List contains the input string parts
